comments.text:
Currently whenever NS_SVG_VAL_IMPL_CYCLE_COLLECTION is used,
the relevant cycle collectable member variable is just traversed, not
unlinked.
comments.author: bugs@pettay.fi
comments.creator: bugs@pettay.fi
comments.raw_text:
Currently whenever NS_SVG_VAL_IMPL_CYCLE_COLLECTION is used,
the relevant cycle collectable member variable is just traversed, not
unlinked.

Or, does something else guarantee that the cycle is removed?

(Something in SVG code is certainly still leaking. Still investigating.)
comments.creator: bugs@pettay.fi
comments.author: bugs@pettay.fi
comments.text:
Or, does something else guarantee that the cycle is removed?

(Something in SVG code is certainly still leaking. Still investigating.)

comments.author: jwatt@jwatt.org
comments.text: Yes, NS_SVG_VAL_IMPL_CYCLE_COLLECTION only traverses, with the understanding that the cycle will be broken elsewhere. It's not inconceivable that this isn't happening under certain circumstances though.
comments.raw_text: Yes, NS_SVG_VAL_IMPL_CYCLE_COLLECTION only traverses, with the understanding that the cycle will be broken elsewhere. It's not inconceivable that this isn't happening under certain circumstances though.
comments.creator: jwatt@jwatt.org
